briefTitle: Comparing the Pharmacokinetic Profile of LY01612 and CAELYX® in Chinese Subjects With Advanced Breast Cancer
officialTitle: A Multicenter, Randomized, Open-lable, Single-dose, Two-cycle, Double-cross Bioequivalence Study Comparing the Pharmacokinetic Profile of LY01612 and CAELYX® in Chinese Subjects With Advanced Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: plasma maximum concentration (Cmax) of encapsulated doxorubicin.
